azurerm_availability_set.description: Manages an Availability Set for Virtual Machines.

name.description: Specifies the name of the availability set. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the availability set. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

platform_update_domain_count.description: Specifies the number of update domains that are used. Defaults to `5`.

platform_fault_domain_count.description: Specifies the number of fault domains that are used. Defaults to `3`.

proximity_placement_group_id.description: The ID of the Proximity Placement Group to which this Virtual Machine should be assigned. Changing this forces a new resource to be created

managed.description: Specifies whether the availability set is managed or not. Possible values are `true` (to specify aligned

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Availability Set.

create.description: Used when creating the Availability Set.

update.description: Used when updating the Availability Set.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Availability Set.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Availability Set.
